member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.License.Embedded
member.summary: License number was added as embedded resource.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.param: Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions
member.summary: Class representing options of saving to PDF.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.JpegQualityLevel
member.summary: The Quality category specifies the level of compression for an image. Available values are 0 to 100. The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 0 value results in lowest quality image, while 100 results in highest.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.OutlineTreeHeight
member.summary: Specifies the height of the document outline tree to save. 0 - the outline tree will not be converted, 1 - only the first level outline items will be converted, ans so on.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.OutlineTreeExpansionLevel
member.summary: Specifies up to what level the document outline should be expanded when the PDF file is viewed. 1 - only the first level outline items are shown, 2 - only the first and second level outline items are shown, and so on. Default is 1.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.TextCompression
member.summary: Specifies compression type to be used for all content streams except images. Default is .

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.ImageCompression
member.summary: Specifies compression type to be used for all images in the document. Default is .

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfSaveOptions.EncryptionDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets a encryption details. If not set, then no encryption will be performed.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfTextCompression
member.summary: Specifies a type of compression applied to all contents in the PDF file except images.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfTextCompression.None
member.summary: None compression type

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfTextCompression.Rle
member.summary: Rle compression type

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfTextCompression.Lzw
member.summary: Lzw compression type

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfTextCompression.Flate
member.summary: Flate compression type

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression
member.summary: Specifies the type of compression applied to images in the PDF file.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.Auto
member.summary: Automatically selects the most appropriate compression for each image.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.None
member.summary: Saves raw image bytes resulting in bigger PDF file sizes.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.Rle
member.summary: Run Length compression.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.Flate
member.summary: Flate compression.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.LzwBaselinePredictor
member.summary: Predictor selection is restricted to PNG Paeth predictor to speed-up the process. In practice performs surprisingly good. Better than .

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.LzwOptimizedPredictor
member.summary: Predictor selection is more complicated and should result in smaller image sizes but taking more time.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfImageCompression.Jpeg
member.summary: JPEG compression. Does not support transparency.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails
member.summary: Contains details for a pdf encryption.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionAlgorithm)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails.UserPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the User password.
member.remarks: Opening the document with the correct user password (or opening a document that does not have a user password) allows additional operations to be performed according to the user access permissions specified in the document’s encryption dictionary.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails.OwnerPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the Owner password.
member.remarks: Opening the document with the correct owner password (assuming it is not the same as the user password) allows full (owner) access to the document. This unlimited access includes the ability to change the document’s passwords and access permissions.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails.Permissions
member.summary: Gets or sets the permissions.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionDetails.EncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: Gets or sets the encryption mode.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: Encryption mode enum. Describe using algorithm and key length. This enum is extended in order to be able to further increase functionality. This enum implements "Base-to-Core" pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionAlgorithm.RC4_40
member.summary: Algorithm, with an RC4 encryption key length of 40 bits;

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Pdf.PdfEncryptionAlgorithm.RC4_128
member.summary: Algorithm, with an RC4 encryption key length of 128 bits and advanced permission set;

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.SaveOptions
member.summary: Basic class for document saving options.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.SaveOptions.SubsetFonts
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag indicating whether to subset fonts in output file or not.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.SaveOptions.RasterizeFormulas
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that allows to rasterize math formulas.

member.summary: Creates new instance. The output file will be written to the output working directory taking the job name as a file name.

member.summary: Creates new instance. The output file will be written to specified stream.

member.summary: Initializes device.

member.summary: Gets the number of pages.

member.summary: Gets destination name: output file name or device description.

member.summary: Creates a copy of this device.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Xps.XpsDevice.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes this device instance. Finalizes this device instance graphics state, i.e. switches APS composing context to the of the level higher then this device's graphics state .

member.summary: Starts the whole document.

member.summary: Stops at every opportunity to interact.

member.summary: Default format provider for ObjectTeX engine extension.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.TeXConfig
member.summary: Class providing available TeX configurations.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXConfig.ObjectIniTeX
member.summary: Gets the configuration of ObjectTeX engine extension with no format preloaded, i.e. in INITEX mode. Supposed to be used for format preparation.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXConfig.ObjectLaTeX
member.summary: Gets the configuration of ObjectTeX engine extension with ObjectLaTeX format preloaded.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXConfig.ObjectTeX(Aspose.TeX.ResourceProviders.FormatProvider)
member.summary: Gets the configuration of ObjectTeX engine extension with provided format preloaded.
member.param: The format provider. If left equal to null then default ObjectTeX format (which is essentially Plain TeX) will be loaded.
member.returns: "ObjectTeX engine extension with provided format preloaded" configuration.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.TeXExtension
member.summary: Class defining constants to choose a TeX engine extension from.

member.name: F:Aspose.TeX.TeXExtension.ObjectTeX
member.summary: ObjectTeX extensions.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob
member.summary: Implements features of a TeX job.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Device,Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions)
member.summary: Creates a TeX job for running the engine in production mode to typeset a TeX file.
member.param: The stream containing the TeX file.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob.#ctor(System.String,Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Device,Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions)
member.summary: Creates a TeX job for running the engine in production mode to typeset a TeX file.
member.param: The path to the TeX file.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob.#ctor(Aspose.TeX.Presentation.Device,Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions)
member.summary: Creates a TeX job for running the engine in production mode to typeset a TeX document. The engine will prompt the file name as soon as it starts. Thus this run is supposed to be interactive.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob.Run
member.summary: Runs TeX job.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXJob.CreateFormat(System.String,Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions)
member.summary: Runs TeX engine in INITEX mode to create a format file (.fmt).
member.param: The path to the main format source file.

member.name: T:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions
member.summary: TeX file processing options class.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.JobName
member.summary: Gets/set the name of the job.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.TerminalIn
member.summary: Gets/sets the input terminal reader.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.TerminalOut
member.summary: Gets/sets the output terminal writer.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.InputWorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets/sets input working directory.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.OutputWorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets/sets output working directory.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.RequiredInputDirectory
member.summary: Gets/sets the directory for the required input, e.g., packages that are beyond Aspose.TeX's LaTeX support.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.Interaction
member.summary: Gets/sets the interaction mode to run a TeX engine in.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.IgnoreMissingPackages
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that instructs the engine whether to halt on missing package read attempt or ignore it.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.SaveOptions
member.summary: Gets/sets options used for rendering into destination format (XPS, PDF, image, etc.). Default value is the set of default options for rendering to XPS.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.DateTime
member.summary: Gets/sets a certain value for date/time primitives like \year, \month, \day and \time.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.Repeat
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that indicates whether it is necessary to run the TeX job twice in case, for example, there are references in input TeX file(s). In general, this behavior is useful when the engine collects some data along the typesetting process and stores it in an auxilliary file, all at the first run. And at the second run, the engine somehow uses that data.

member.name: P:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.NoLigatures
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that cancels ligatures in all fonts.

member.name: M:Aspose.TeX.TeXOptions.ConsoleAppOptions(Aspose.TeX.TeXConfig)
member.summary: Returns options for use in console application.
